items.title: American Express Upgrades Quarterly Dividend 17%
items.description: By Sabela Ojea American Express is raising its quarterly dividend by 17% to 82 cents a share. The credit card giant on Monday said that its board of directors authorized increasing its...

items.title: Berkshire Hathaway: Buffett Sells Banks, Buys Beer And Pizza As Economic Indicators Worsen
items.description: Warren Buffett has sold record amounts of stock over the past 18 months but hasn't given the public much information as to why. Read more on the inflation-resistant picks made by Berkshire.

items.title: American Express Elects Michael J. Angelakis to Board of Directors
